title: Lex talionis, or, The author of Naked truth stript naked
author: Fell, Philip, 1632 or 3-1682.
notes: "First ascribed to Dr. Peter Gunning; afterwards to Dr. William Lloyd; but on better grounds, it is ascribed to Rev. Philip Fell, Fellow of Eton College"--Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
